We have recently launched new plans offering free cPanel/WHM & Direct Admin licenses along with Comodo Positive SSL. All our VPS plans come with fully managed support. We even help you to migrate all your data, accounts, install scripts. All our VPS are setup on premium hardware and we do not oversell our services.

Use coupon code WELCOME to receive 15% Recurring discount on any plan. This is a lifetime discount and also applies to plan upgrades.

All VPS plans include:

• OpenVZ / SOLUSVM
• FREE & INSTANT SETUP!
• 24/7 Support
• No long term contracts
• 100Mbps network connection
• SoluVM VPS Management Portal
• Unlimited Reboots/Reinstalls
• Fully Managed
• Root Access
• Free Initial Setup & Security
• Free migration assistance (We Migrate your data and websites)
• Raid 1 Disk Space

Free Control Panels & SSL :

Free Direct Admin + Comodo Positive SSL on Standard & Enhanced VPS
Free cPanel/WHM + Comodo Positive SSL on Premium & Ultimate VPS

To active the cPanel, DA licenses and to get the SSL please open a ticket after your VPS is deployed. cPanel licenses can be issued within an hour and Direct Admin may take upto 4 hours.
